code: @Test public void copyFileFromContainerHeaderTest() {     String containerId = "9c09acd48a25".     String resource = "/test".     String hostPath = "/test/test2".     Map<String, Object> headers = getDefaultParameters().     headers.put(DockerConstants.DOCKER_CONTAINER_ID, containerId).     headers.put(DockerConstants.DOCKER_RESOURCE, resource).     headers.put(DockerConstants.DOCKER_HOST_PATH, hostPath).     template.sendBodyAndHeaders("direct:in", "", headers).
